product_name: Lowa Vento QC Hiking Boots - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for light and fast treks on your favorite trails, the men's Lowa Vento QC Hiking Boots deliver lightweight, highly breathable performance. Split-grain leather and nylon mesh uppers supply durability and breathability; external polyurethane frame design offers support and reduces need for extra internal padding. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from your feet to keep them dry and comfortable. Padded ankles and tongues relieve pressure and add comfort; removable footbeds add cushioning and support underfoot. Contoured polyurethane midsoles with nylon stabilizer shanks provide dependable cushioning and lightweight support. Lowa "Cross" rubber outsoles deliver excellent traction on all types of terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for light and fast treks on your favorite trails, the men's Lowa Vento QC Hiking Boots deliver lightweight, highly breathable performance.
